description: Estonian composer known for his distinctive 'tintinnabuli' style that creates hauntingly beautiful, minimalist sacred music. His compositions bridge ancient and contemporary, earning worldwide acclaim.
philosophy: I have discovered that it is enough when a single note is beautifully played. This one note, or a silent beat, or a moment of silence, comforts me. I work with very few elements - with one voice, with two voices. I build with the most primitive materials.
